Class CurrencyConversionService

public without sharing class CurrencyConversionService

Description: Service class to handle currency conversion References:

Changes

3/9/24 Initial version. 5/13/24 Added static invocable method getConversionRate() to get a conversion rate from a flow.

Members

  Modifiers and Type Name Description
public class
ConversionRateRequest
Wrapper class to request the conversion rate for the given currency and date

Constructors

public CurrencyConversionService(
  Set<String> currencyIsoCodes,
  Date earliestDate
)

Constructor: initializes the service with the given currencies and earliest date

Parameters:
    currencyIsoCodes – Set: Set of currency ISO codes to get the conversion rates for
    earliestDate – Date: Earliest date to get the conversion rates for

Fields

public final static String DEFAULT_CURRENCY

Default Currency: enterprise/corporate currency used for transactions (USD)

public final static Decimal DEFAULT_CURRENCY_CONVERSION_RATE

Default Currency Conversion Rate: default conversion rate used for the default currency

Methods

@InvocableMethod(category='BlazeBite' description='Gets the conversion rate for a given currency and date' label='Get Conversion Rate')
public static List<Decimal> getConversionRate(List<CurrencyConversionService.ConversionRateRequest> rateRequest)

Invocable method to get the conversion rate for the given currency and date

Parameters:
    rateRequest – ConversionRateRequest Wrapper class containing the currency ISO code and conversion rate date

Returns:
    Decimal: Conversion rate for the given currency and date

public Decimal getConversionRate(
  String currencyIsoCode,
  Date conversionRateDate
)

Gets the conversion rate for the given currency and date

Parameters:
    currencyIsoCode – String: Currency ISO code to get the conversion rate for
    conversionRateDate – Date: Date for the conversion rate

Returns:
    Decimal: Conversion rate for the given currency and date
